test.name: CT01: Verificar Tela de Educação Previdenciária no potal MultiBra

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Dado que acesso o portal MultiBra com os usuarios "ut.gdb.auto1" - "ut.gdb.auto1"
kw.sourcename: Dado que acesso o portal MultiBra com os usuarios "${Usuario}" - "${Senha}"

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Quando clico no menu lateral acesso Educação Previdenciária
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então serei direcionado para página Educação Previdenciária
Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
